title: Replacement - Novel Updates
tags: Androids   Death of Loved Ones   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Short Story
author: 象八亿
description:
Tong Lexian lost his son Xiao’an. In order to fill the void in his heart, he bought a high-intelligence AI to replace Xiao’an.

But something is wrong with this AI. He could not use the AI as a replacement for his son and the AI did not want to have a father-son relationship with him.

These are sweet and bloody short story with tens of thousands of words.

One sentence introduction: No one can become another’s replacement in other’s heart

End line: Will AI become human when it has feelings?>
